resources.string: There are so many clubs at ZCHS- with so many options, it\'s hard to narrow it down to just a few! With the ClubFinder Quiz, you can easily find the clubs that are right for you by answering a few simple questions. And if you still haven\'t found what you\'re looking for, use the Club Catalogue to find detailed information including club descriptions, meeting dates, fees, and more.

Here are your results! Scroll through the list below and click on a club to see more detailed information about it. And if these results don\'t seem quite right, you can go back and retake the quiz, or view all of ZCHS\'s clubs in the Club Catalogue.
